comments.creator: onecyrenus@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
When a user logs out from the store, the UI doesn't seem to allow you to login as someoene else. 

On mobile whenever I click login i get pushed into my previous login, without needing a password. 

Ideally they are presented with a username / password prompt again.

comments.text: The whole market/dashboard experience needs to be linked to one identity and managed by soup.
comments.author: bugzilla@digitarald.com
comments.raw_text: The whole market/dashboard experience needs to be linked to one identity and managed by soup.
comments.creator: bugzilla@digitarald.com
jsmith@mozilla.com
comments.author: jsmith@mozilla.com
comments.text: Either this bug was fixed or this works for me. When I logout of Soup, if I try login again, I will be prompted with a browser ID confirmation starting by asking for an email. This implies that the UI does allow you to login as a someone else. David - Can you confirm?
comments.raw_text: Either this bug was fixed or this works for me. When I logout of Soup, if I try login again, I will be prompted with a browser ID confirmation starting by asking for an email. This implies that the UI does allow you to login as a someone else. David - Can you confirm?
